sentences.sContent: Abstract: with the mine production mechanization degree unceasing enhancement, as a traditional method of coal blasting fall coal mining machinery has gradually be replaced.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abstract: with the mine production mechanization degree unceasing enhancement, as a traditional method of coal blasting fall coal mining machinery has gradually be replaced.
sentences.sCn: 摘要：随着煤矿生产机械化程度的不断提高，作为传统采煤方法的爆破落煤已逐渐被机械采煤所代替。

phrases.pCn: 系统机械化；全盘机械化
